name: clickup-mcp-server
description: AI-powered task management with 72 tools for ClickUp workspaces
long_description:
A comprehensive Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that enables AI agents to securely interact with ClickUp workspaces. Features 72 tools across 12 categories including:

- **Task Management** (27 tools): Create, update, search, move, duplicate, delete tasks with full CRUD operations
- **List Management** (12 tools): Organize tasks into lists, manage settings and permissions
- **Workspace Operations** (8 tools): Manage hierarchy, spaces, and team structure
- **Time Tracking** (6 tools): Track time, manage entries, generate reports
- **Custom Fields** (5 tools): Create and manage custom fields
- **Space Management** (4 tools): Organize work with tags and settings
- **Goal Tracking** (3 tools): Create and monitor goals
- **Documents** (7 tools): Create and manage workspace documents
- **Comments & Attachments**: Add comments and attach files to tasks

Key features:
- Natural language date parsing (47+ patterns)
- Bulk operations with concurrent processing
- Name-based entity resolution
- Built-in rate limiting
- Markdown formatting support

tools.name: get_workspace_hierarchy
tools.description: Get complete workspace structure with spaces, folders, and lists

tools.name: create_task
tools.description: Create a new task with natural language date parsing

tools.name: get_task
tools.description: Get task details by ID or custom task ID

tools.name: update_task
tools.description: Update task properties including status, priority, dates

tools.name: move_task
tools.description: Move task to a different list

tools.name: duplicate_task
tools.description: Create a copy of an existing task

tools.name: get_task_comments
tools.description: Get all comments on a task

tools.name: create_task_comment
tools.description: Add a comment to a task

tools.name: attach_task_file
tools.description: Attach a file to a task

tools.name: move_bulk_tasks
tools.description: Move multiple tasks to a different list

tools.name: get_task_time_entries
tools.description: Get time tracking entries for a task

tools.name: start_time_tracking
tools.description: Start tracking time on a task

tools.name: add_time_entry
tools.description: Add a manual time entry to a task

tools.name: create_list
tools.description: Create a new list in a space

tools.name: create_list_in_folder
tools.description: Create a new list in a folder

tools.name: get_list
tools.description: Get list details by ID or name

tools.name: create_folder
tools.description: Create a new folder in a space

tools.name: get_folder
tools.description: Get folder details by ID or name

tools.name: get_space_tags
tools.description: Get all tags in a space

tools.name: add_tag_to_task
tools.description: Add a tag to a task

tools.name: remove_tag_from_task
tools.description: Remove a tag from a task

api_key.title: ClickUp API Key
api_key.description: Your ClickUp API token. Get it from ClickUp Settings > Apps > API Token

team_id.title: Team ID
team_id.description: Your ClickUp team/workspace ID. Find it in your ClickUp URL or via get_workspace_hierarchy

log_level.title: Log Level
log_level.description: Logging verbosity: ERROR, WARN, INFO, DEBUG, TRACE
